content: seaside shawl after modifying my movie night shawl once my brain kicked into overdrive and i found another way to modify the design into a top down shawl it is just a touch more complex than my usual 1-2 row repeat shawls while the ends of the shawls operate at a 2-row repeat the center spine of the shawl works a little differently and operates at a 3-row repeat otherwise the rest of the shawl is the same putting a shell into a shell and not into the chain spaces between shells unless otherwise indicated materials needed fingering weight yarn h hook 5mm yarn needle special stitches shell 2dc ch1 2dc all in chain space of indicated shell increase shell 2dc ch1 2dc ch1 2dc all in chain space of indicated shell shell in shell work a shell into the chain space of the shell from the previous row increase shell in shell work an increase shell into the chain space of the shell from the previous row shell is begun with a magic_ring if you do not like to work with the magic_ring you can ch3 or ch4 and join into a ring shawl is worked in back and forth row always turn work at the end of a row begin with magic_ring row 1 ch2 shell ch1 shell in magic_ring row 2 ch2 increase shell in
